last_update: The time of the last file update, represented as Unix Epoch time.
authors: Names of the individuals who contributed to editing the text.
reviewers: Names of the individuals who reviewed the text.

primary_sources.id: Unique indentifier for specific primary source

reference_sources.id: Unique indentifier for specific primary source
reference_sources.citation: The reference talking about a primary source or a person.

religious_sources.id: Unique indentifier for specific primary source
religious_sources.citation: The religious source talking about a person.
